turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to order some coffee from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. which petes did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get it from the looks like the pizza on 4th 4th Street in a in a.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a iced Havana cappuccino with 2% milk. And can you make that a medium?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a medium iced havana cappucchino with 2% from the peets on 4th in Santa Rosa.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me think for half a second here.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then I think that covers everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a good day and take care.
